911622.TW.long_name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
911622.TW.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

AMC.BK.summary: Asia Metal Public Company Limited produces and sells processed steel products in Thailand. It offers hot-rolled, pickled and oiled, and cold-rolled products to steel wholesalers and end user factories; and round, square, and rectangular steel pipes, as well as light lips channels and C-shaped furring. The company also trades in round-bars and deformed-bars, as well as square and round steel tubes. In addition, it provides steel cutting and modifying services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

BSBM-R.BK.summary: Bangsaphan Barmill Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes deformed and round steel bars in Thailand. Its products are used for concrete building structures. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BSBM.BK.summary: Bangsaphan Barmill Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes deformed and round steel bars in Thailand. Its products are used for concrete building structures. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CEN.BK.long_name: Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited
CEN.BK.summary: Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes prestressed concrete wires and strand wires, and welding wires primarily in Thailand. It also manufactures and distributes industrial equipment, transmission line towers, and telecommunication towers, as well as electricity and heat energy; and distributes substation steel structures. In addition, the company engages in the construction and tunnel excavation, trading and investing, and fabrication construction and design activities; distributes fuel for power plants; and operates biogas and biomass power plants. Further, it manufactures and sells woodchips; manages human resource functions; and leases a telecommunication tower. The company was formerly known as Eastern Wire Public Company Limited and changed its name to Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited in May 2009. Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHOW.BK.long_name: Chow Steel Industries Public Company Limited
CHOW.BK.summary: Chow Steel Industries Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of steel billets in Thailand. The company's billets are used in the production of round bars, deformed bars, wire rods, etc. It also generates and distributes electricity from renewable energy sources; provides logistics services through trailer-trucks; constructs and manages power plants; invests in solar power generation and distribution business; and offers project and efficiency insurance for renewable power plants, as well as provides consultancy services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CSP.BK.long_name: CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited
CSP.BK.summary: CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel products in Thailand. It offers steel sheets in coils as master coils, steel plates, structural steel, and others for industrial and production industries, as well as imports and purchases steel products from suppliers. The company also provides hot-rolled and cold-rolled steel pipes; and specializes in customizing steel sheets to other shapes. It serves clients in the automobiles, home and electric appliances, steel furniture, general usage, and structure and construction industries. The company was formerly known as CSP Trading Company Limited and changed its name to CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited in July 2005. CSP Steel Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GJS-R.BK.short_name: G J STEEL PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITE
GJS-R.BK.long_name: G J Steel Public Company Limited
GJS-R.BK.summary: G J Steel Public Company Limited manufactures and sells flat-rolled steel products in Thailand. The company offers commercial/drawing, structural, pipe, automotive, atmospheric corrosion resistance, and gas cylinder and pressure vessel steel products. It also provides business consulting and advisory services. The company was formerly known as Nakornthai Strip Mill Public Company Limited and changed its name to G J Steel Public Company Limited in June 2008. G J Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GJS.BK.short_name: G J STEEL PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITE
GJS.BK.long_name: G J Steel Public Company Limited
GJS.BK.summary: G J Steel Public Company Limited manufactures and sells flat-rolled steel products in Thailand. The company offers commercial/drawing, structural, pipe, automotive, atmospheric corrosion resistance, and gas cylinder and pressure vessel steel products. It also provides business consulting and advisory services. The company was formerly known as Nakornthai Strip Mill Public Company Limited and changed its name to G J Steel Public Company Limited in June 2008. G J Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HTU.F.summary: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; kitchenware; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, building, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO.

INOX-R.BK.summary: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; kitchenware; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, building, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO.

INOX.BK.summary: POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited produces, sells, and exports cold-rolled stainless steel products in Thailand and internationally. It offers austenitic and ferritic stainless steel products used as raw material in the production of automotive and transportation parts; electrical home appliances; kitchenware; food processing and medical equipment; heavy industry, energy, and environmental equipment; and architecture, building, and construction equipment. The company was formerly known as Thainox Stainless Public Company Limited and changed its name to POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited in 2011. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. POSCO-Thainox Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of POSCO.

LHK-R.BK.summary: Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in processing, distributing, and shearing of stainless steel, steel, and metal products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Production and Distribution; and Procurement and Distribution. The company offers cold and hot rolled, austenitic, ferritic, and special stainless steel products; and ornamental tube, square and rectangular tube, automotive pipe, electro-galvanized steel, and galvanized steel products under the D-Stainless brand name. It also distributes metal and non-ferrous metal products, as well as aluminum coil and sheet, brass, copper, and zinc products; and provides cutting, drilling, and polishing services. In addition, the company is involved in smelting and assembling metal products. It serves construction, decoration, structure, food, petrochemical, and household appliances industries. Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Lohakit Metal Service Center Company Limited and changed its name to Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited in January 2003. Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

LHK.BK.summary: Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in processing, distributing, and shearing of stainless steel, steel, and metal products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Production and Distribution; and Procurement and Distribution. The company offers cold and hot rolled, austenitic, ferritic, and special stainless steel products; and ornamental tube, square and rectangular tube, automotive pipe, electro-galvanized steel, and galvanized steel products under the D-Stainless brand name. It also distributes metal and non-ferrous metal products, as well as aluminum coil and sheet, brass, copper, and zinc products; and provides cutting, drilling, and polishing services. In addition, the company is involved in smelting and assembling metal products. It serves construction, decoration, structure, food, petrochemical, and household appliances industries. Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Lohakit Metal Service Center Company Limited and changed its name to Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited in January 2003. Lohakit Metal Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.

M86.SG.summary: M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited produces and distributes structural steel products for building construction in Thailand and internationally. The company engages in the fabrication of steel structure building, power plant, bridge, and general steel works. It is also involved in welder training and real estate activities; and provision of engineering and design services, as well as parts. The company was formerly known as M.C.S.HOKOKU CO., LTD. and changed its name to M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited in 2001. M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

MCS-R.BK.summary: M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited produces and distributes structural steel products for building construction in Thailand and internationally. The company engages in the fabrication of steel structure building, power plant, bridge, and general steel works. It is also involved in welder training and real estate activities; and provision of engineering and design services, as well as parts. The company was formerly known as M.C.S.HOKOKU CO., LTD. and changed its name to M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited in 2001. M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

MCS.BK.summary: M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited produces and distributes structural steel products for building construction in Thailand and internationally. The company engages in the fabrication of steel structure building, power plant, bridge, and general steel works. It is also involved in welder training and real estate activities; and provision of engineering and design services, as well as parts. The company was formerly known as M.C.S.HOKOKU CO., LTD. and changed its name to M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited in 2001. M.C.S. Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

MVX.F.summary: Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and trades in steel bars, wire rods, and small section products primarily in Thailand. The company offers reinforcing bars (rebar); low and high carbon wire rods; carbon wire rod for cold heading; wire rod for welding electrode; small section structural steel, consisting of angle and channel steel; carbon steel round bars; and cut and bend rebar. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Millennium Steel Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited in December 2006. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T S Global Holdings Pte. Ltd.

NOVA.BK.summary: Nova Empire Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes galvanized iron sheets primarily in Thailand. The company offers hot dipped zinc coated steel sheets, including flat sheets for use in advertising and sign boards, air-ducts, bathroom doors, cabinets, vehicles extensions, and water storage industries; and corrugated sheets for roofing, fencing, partitioning, and siding of houses and buildings, as well as painted hot dipped zinc coated steel flat and corrugated sheets. It also provides roofing and siding installation services. The company was formerly known as Thailand Iron Works Public Company Limited and changed its name to Nova Empire Public Company Limited in February 2021. Nova Empire Public Company Limited was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Phra Samut Chedi, Thailand.

NVP2.MU.long_name: G J Steel Public Company Limited
NVP2.MU.summary: G J Steel Public Company Limited manufactures and sells flat-rolled steel products in Thailand. The company offers commercial/drawing, structural, pipe, automotive, atmospheric corrosion resistance, and gas cylinder and pressure vessel steel products. It also provides business consulting and advisory services. The company was formerly known as Nakornthai Strip Mill Public Company Limited and changed its name to G J Steel Public Company Limited in June 2008. G J Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PAP.BK.summary: Pacific Pipe Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steel pipes for construction works primarily in Thailand. It provides round, square, and rectangular pipes, as well as C-shaped, black, galvanized, coated, and lip channel steel pipes; and laboratory testing, steel pipe processing and transportation services. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Phra Samut Chedi, Thailand.

PERM-R.BK.long_name: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited
PERM-R.BK.summary: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steel products in Thailand. The company offers coil products, such as hot and cold rolled products; galvanized iron products; steel, and aluminum or zinc products; high strength purlin products; and steel coatings, as well as c-line, c-u, t-bar, roll forming metal, and electro-galvanized steel products. It also offers metal sheets and PU foam sheets; and steel pipes. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

PERM.BK.long_name: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited
PERM.BK.summary: Permsin Steel Works Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes steel products in Thailand. The company offers coil products, such as hot and cold rolled products; galvanized iron products; steel, and aluminum or zinc products; high strength purlin products; and steel coatings, as well as c-line, c-u, t-bar, roll forming metal, and electro-galvanized steel products. It also offers metal sheets and PU foam sheets; and steel pipes. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Sakhon, Thailand.

RWI-R.BK.long_name: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited
RWI-R.BK.summary: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel wire products primarily in Thailand. The company offers pre-stressed concrete wires for use in the production of piles, electricity poles, finished floor slabs, and concrete railroad tiles; pre-stressed concrete strand wires that are used in construction works, including bridge beams, elevated roads, large-sized piles, and silos; and welding wires for various applications in metal welding industries, such as motorcar assembling and parts, shipbuilding docks, containers, water pump ducts, gas tanks, wheel ploughs, power transformers, and furniture. It also provides hard drawn wires, such as spring wire for use in mattress, auto parts, wire mesh, and spring industries; low carbon steel wires, which are used in piling industry, electricity posts, and drains; and wire mesh products used in the construction of roads, buildings, and finished walls. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited.

RWI.BK.long_name: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited
RWI.BK.summary: Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel wire products primarily in Thailand. The company offers pre-stressed concrete wires for use in the production of piles, electricity poles, finished floor slabs, and concrete railroad tiles; pre-stressed concrete strand wires that are used in construction works, including bridge beams, elevated roads, large-sized piles, and silos; and welding wires for various applications in metal welding industries, such as motorcar assembling and parts, shipbuilding docks, containers, water pump ducts, gas tanks, wheel ploughs, power transformers, and furniture. It also provides hard drawn wires, such as spring wire for use in mattress, auto parts, wire mesh, and spring industries; low carbon steel wires, which are used in piling industry, electricity posts, and drains; and wire mesh products used in the construction of roads, buildings, and finished walls. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Rayong Wire Industries Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Capital Engineering Network Public Company Limited.

SAM-R.BK.long_name: Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited
SAM-R.BK.summary: Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel pipes for the construction and furniture industries in Thailand and internationally. It provides structural steel pipes, galvanized steel pipes, tubes for furniture purposes, and black hot rolled steel plates and sheets under the SAMCHAI, SSH, TUBULARGE, TUS, and USC names. The company was formerly known as Samchai Holding Public Company and changed its name to Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited in December 2002. Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand. Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Leekanchanakorn Group.

SAM.BK.long_name: Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited
SAM.BK.summary: Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes steel pipes for the construction and furniture industries in Thailand and internationally. It provides structural steel pipes, galvanized steel pipes, tubes for furniture purposes, and black hot rolled steel plates and sheets under the SAMCHAI, SSH, TUBULARGE, TUS, and USC names. The company was formerly known as Samchai Holding Public Company and changed its name to Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited in December 2002. Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand. Samchai Steel Industries Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Leekanchanakorn Group.

SSSC-R.BK.long_name: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited
SSSC-R.BK.summary: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel accessories in Thailand. The company offers cutting sheets and slitting coils for automotive, electrical appliances and electronics, furniture, and other related industries; and coated corrugated sheets for construction industries. It also provides metal roofing and wall panel installation, and steel cutting services; and special production and services. Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

SSSC.BK.long_name: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited
SSSC.BK.summary: Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel accessories in Thailand. The company offers cutting sheets and slitting coils for automotive, electrical appliances and electronics, furniture, and other related industries; and coated corrugated sheets for construction industries. It also provides metal roofing and wall panel installation, and steel cutting services; and special production and services. Siam Steel Service Center Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.

TGPRO-R.BK.summary: Thai-German Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, sheets, axles, and equipment in Thailand. The company offers industrial stainless steel pipes; heat exchanger tubes; stainless steel pipes for sugar and ice industries; decorative stainless steel pipes; sanitary tubes for food, beverage, and pharmaceutical industries; Hartsfield stainless 3D products; and stainless steel sheets for applications in indoor and outdoor decoration, kitchenware, furniture, refrigerator, etc. It also provides Extuba turbo tubes; ornamental tubes that are used as handles of subway and sky train stations, interior/exterior doors of buildings, overpass fences, kitchen equipment, furniture, and pushcarts; and Missspectro services. In addition, the company offers services, such as coil slitting, coil polishing, and cutting of coil to sheets for various industries, including automotive, cold storage, kitchenware, etc.; stainless steel grade testing services; and stainless steel forming services, such as round, flat, and angle bars. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

TGPRO.BK.summary: Thai-German Products Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes, sheets, axles, and equipment in Thailand. The company offers industrial stainless steel pipes; heat exchanger tubes; stainless steel pipes for sugar and ice industries; decorative stainless steel pipes; sanitary tubes for food, beverage, and pharmaceutical industries; Hartsfield stainless 3D products; and stainless steel sheets for applications in indoor and outdoor decoration, kitchenware, furniture, refrigerator, etc. It also provides Extuba turbo tubes; ornamental tubes that are used as handles of subway and sky train stations, interior/exterior doors of buildings, overpass fences, kitchen equipment, furniture, and pushcarts; and Missspectro services. In addition, the company offers services, such as coil slitting, coil polishing, and cutting of coil to sheets for various industries, including automotive, cold storage, kitchenware, etc.; stainless steel grade testing services; and stainless steel forming services, such as round, flat, and angle bars. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

TMT.BK.summary: Tmt Steel Public Company Limited sells and transforms structural steel, plates, and sheets primarily in Thailand. It offers flat products, including hot rolled sheets and plates, flat bars, slitting coils, and checkered plates; cold forming products, including round, rectangular, square, primer coated, and galvanized steel tubes, as well as pipes, light channel and angle, and primer coated and galvanized c channel. The company also provides hot formed steel products, such as H- section, cut, and I-section beam, as well as round and deformed bars, equal angle, and channel. In addition, it provides steel processing and cold forming services. The company was formerly known as Thai Metal Trade Public Company Limited. Tmt Steel Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSTH-R.BK.summary: Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and trades in steel bars, wire rods, and small section products primarily in Thailand. The company offers reinforcing bars (rebar); low and high carbon wire rods; carbon wire rod for cold heading; wire rod for welding electrode; small section structural steel, consisting of angle and channel steel; carbon steel round bars; and cut and bend rebar. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Millennium Steel Public Company Limited and changed its name to Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited in December 2006. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T S Global Holdings Pte. Ltd.

TSTH.BK.summary: Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and trades in steel bars, wire rods, and small section products primarily in Thailand. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Tata Steel (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of T S Global Holdings Pte. Ltd.

TYCN-R.BK.long_name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
TYCN-R.BK.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

TYCN.BK.long_name: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited
TYCN.BK.summary: Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and exports steel wire rods, steel annealing wires, reinforced concrete bars, steel screws, and wire products in Thailand. It also provides spheroidized annealing wires, bolts, and thread rods; and engages in trading activities. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Rayong, Thailand. Tycoons Worldwide Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tycoons Group International Co., Ltd.

UWC-R.BK.summary: Ua Withya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes galvanized steel structures, electricity poles, telecommunication poles, and electricity sub-stations in Thailand. The company also provides galvanizing services; and distributes power transmission equipment. In addition, it is involved in the operation of biomass, solar, and biogas power plants. Further, the company manufactures and sells agricultural products and woodchips, as well as sells industrial products. Ua Withya Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UWC.BK.summary: Ua Withya Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes galvanized steel structures, electricity poles, telecommunication poles, and electricity sub-stations in Thailand. The company also provides galvanizing services; and distributes power transmission equipment. In addition, it is involved in the operation of biomass, solar, and biogas power plants. Further, the company manufactures and sells agricultural products and woodchips, as well as sells industrial products. Ua Withya Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ZIGA-R.BK.summary: Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in steel conduits for electrical wiring systems in Thailand. It also provides steel pipings for construction and real estate businesses. The company was formerly known as Daiwa Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited in February 2016. Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Samut Prakarn, Thailand.

ZIGA.BK.summary: Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited manufactures and trades in steel conduits for electrical wiring systems in Thailand. It also provides steel pipings for construction and real estate businesses. The company was formerly known as Daiwa Industry Company Limited and changed its name to Ziga Innovation Public Company Limited in February 2016.
